pages.title: Tag Tool
pages.text: With an item in the offhand and the $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Tag-Tool)Tag Tool/$ in your main hand, right-click in the air. A message on screen will list all the tags that item has on it, tags can be used to rename items for the $(2:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Filter-Tag)Filter Tag/$ upgrade, which can be used to target item 'groups' for filtering.
